product_name: The North Face Rolling Thunder Duffel - 31''
long_description: Ideal for gear-intensive trips, the 31 in. Rolling Thunder duffel by The North Face offers durability, easy transporting and a generous packing compartment. Main compartment and side accessory compartment feature internal zippered pockets for added storage and organization. Organizer pocket on top of the duffel provides additional storage. Wing handles make toting easy; external compression straps keep load secure. Reinforced in-line-skate wheels roll smoothly and quietly over parking lots, carpets and uneven terrain. The North Face Rolling Thunder duffel is finished with a top ID pocket. Heavy-duty polyester construction resists wear and tear for long-lasting use.
short_description: Ideal for gear-intensive trips, the 31 in. Rolling Thunder duffel by The North Face offers durability, easy transporting and a generous packing compartment.
